entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
